DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this project is to investigate whether a 12-week, fulltime pulmonary rehabilitation program can enhance cognitive functioning, mood, anxiety, and quality of life in patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD).
DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary Rehabilitation: Effects on Cognitive Functioning, Mood, Anxiety, and Quality of Life in Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: COPD Referral to the Extensive Pulmonary Rehabilitation Program Unfinished primary school Referral to the Compact Pulmonary Rehabilitation Program
